compliance for mandatory vaccinations is
about 90% in the US but the HPV vaccine
that protects against cancer from a
sexually transmitted virus is only

that as some people saw it as it was
rolled out in Texas and elsewhere that

important to keep in mind here when we

human beings do that we put them on

have in my head a number of mental

categorize new information so HPV
vaccine the HPV vaccine is a great
example because then I can either put

put that on on a sexual intercourse
among minors or among people who we
